mapper.select: SELECT SIGNON.USERID, ACCOUNT.EMAIL, ACCOUNT.FIRSTNAME, ACCOUNT.LASTNAME, ACCOUNT.STATUS, ACCOUNT.ADDR1 AS address1, ACCOUNT.ADDR2 AS address2, ACCOUNT.CITY, ACCOUNT.STATE, ACCOUNT.ZIP, ACCOUNT.COUNTRY, ACCOUNT.PHONE, FROM ACCOUNT, SIGNON WHERE ACCOUNT.USERID = #{userid} AND SIGNON.USERID = ACCOUNT.USERID

SELECT SIGNON.USERID, ACCOUNT.EMAIL, ACCOUNT.FIRSTNAME, ACCOUNT.LASTNAME, ACCOUNT.STATUS, ACCOUNT.ADDR1 AS address1, ACCOUNT.ADDR2 AS address2, ACCOUNT.CITY, ACCOUNT.STATE, ACCOUNT.ZIP, ACCOUNT.COUNTRY, ACCOUNT.PHONE FROM ACCOUNT, SIGNON WHERE ACCOUNT.USERID = #{userid} AND SIGNON.PASSWORD = #{password} AND SIGNON.USERID = ACCOUNT.USERID
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT SET EMAIL = #{email}, FIRSTNAME = #{firstName}, LASTNAME = #{lastName}, STATUS = #{status}, ADDR1 = #{address1}, ADDR2 = #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city}, STATE = #{state}, ZIP = #{zip}, COUNTRY = #{country}, PHONE = #{phone} WHERE USERID = #{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT (EMAIL, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, STATUS, ADDR1, ADDR2, CITY, STATE, ZIP, COUNTRY, PHONE, USERID) VALUES (#{email}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, 'OK', #{address1}, #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city}, #{state}, #{zip}, #{country}, #{phone}, #{userid})
mapper.update: UPDATE SIGNON SET PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE USERID = #{userid}
